content: **evergreen crochet christmas stocking pattern** add a cozy handmade touch to your holiday décor or create thoughtful gifts with this beautifully textured generously sized christmas stocking full of festive charm it s worked seamlessly in one piece using bulky or doubled worsted-weight yarn quick to make and perfect for advanced beginners and beyond **pattern attributes** - the pattern is simple complete detailed and thoroughly tested - written in us terms - skill level easy -size w = 6 / h = 15 1/2 - yarn type #5 bulky yarn you can double a worsted-weight yarn - crochet hook 6 5 mm - the pattern includes step-by-step detailed written instructions and a full photo tutorial
